016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers.DnsLookupService;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jersey.client.providers.SRVConnectorProvider;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jetty.client.JettyClientSslConfiguration;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023import jakarta.inject.Inject;
024import jakarta.inject.Named;
025import jakarta.inject.Provider;
026import jakarta.ws.rs.client.ClientBuilder;
027import org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient;
028import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
029import org.glassfish.hk2.api.InstantiationService;
030import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PerLookup;
031import org.glassfish.jersey.client.ClientConfig;
032import org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.connector.JettyConnectorProvider;
033import org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.connector.JettyHttpClientSupplier;
034import org.glassfish.jersey.logging.LoggingFeature;
035import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
036
037import java.util.Iterator;
038
039@Service
040public class ClientBuilderFactory
041        implements Factory<ClientBuilder> {
042
043    private HttpClient client;
044    private Configuration configuration;
045    private InstantiationService instantiationService;
046    private Provider<DnsLookupService> dnsLookups;
047
048    @Inject
049    public ClientBuilderFactory(HttpClient client,
050                                Configuration configuration,
051                                InstantiationService instantiationService,
052                                Provider<DnsLookupService> dnsLookups) {
053        this.client = client;
054        this.configuration = configuration;
055        this.instantiationService = instantiationService;
056        this.dnsLookups = dnsLookups;
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    @PerLookup
061    public ClientBuilder provide() {
062        String loggerName = "default";
063        if (instantiationService.getInstantiationData().getParentInjectee() != null) {
064            Class<?> injecteeClass = instantiationService.getInstantiationData().getParentInjectee().getInjecteeClass();
065            Named named = injecteeClass.getAnnotation(Named.class);
066            if (named != null) {
067                loggerName = "client." + named;
068            } else {
069                loggerName = injecteeClass.getName();
070            }
071        }
072
073        JerseyClientConfiguration jerseyClientConfiguration = new JerseyClientConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("jersey.client"));
074
075        ClientConfig clientConfig = new ClientConfig();
076        jerseyClientConfiguration.getProperties().ifPresent(json ->
077        {
078            if (json instanceof ObjectNode on) {
079                Iterator<String> fieldNames = on.fieldNames();
080                while (fieldNames.hasNext()) {
081                    String next = fieldNames.next();
082                    clientConfig.property(next, on.get(next).textValue());
083                }
084            }
085        });
086
087        DnsLookupService dnsLookup = dnsLookups.get();
088
089        JettyConnectorProvider jettyConnectorProvider = new JettyConnectorProvider();
090
091        return ClientBuilder.newBuilder()
092                .withConfig(clientConfig
093                        .connectorProvider(dnsLookup != null ? new SRVConnectorProvider(dnsLookup, jettyConnectorProvider) : jettyConnectorProvider))
094                .register(new LoggingFeature.LoggingFeatureBuilder().withLogger(java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(loggerName)).build())
095                .register(new JettyHttpClientSupplier(client));
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public void dispose(ClientBuilder instance) {
100    }
101}
